ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centers, offices & administrative buildings. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with working at heights. Working at heights can include tasks where activity is carried out on any structure or plant being constructed or installed, demolished or dismantled, inspected, tested, repaired or cleaned, on a fragile surface(roofs), on a potentially unstable surface, using equipment to work at the elevated level (elevating work platforms or portable ladders) on a sloping or slippery surface where it is difficult for people to maintain their balance, near an unprotected open edge (near incomplete stairwells), and near a hole, shaft(trenches, service pits).
